ch.ethz.vizzly

Class VizzlyStateContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.ethz.vizzly.VizzlyStateContainer

  • public class VizzlyStateContainer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all state that is needed to run the application. For example, the memory cache is initialized here. During runtime, this object is stored in the servlet context.
    Author:
    Matthias Keller
